provideDayNamesErrorMessage: Παρακαλώ δώστε ονόματα για όλες τις ημέρες.
fillExercisesErrorMessage: Παρακαλώ συμπληρώστε όλες τις ασκήσεις με έγκυρα δεδομένα.
failedToCreateWorkoutErrorMessage: Αποτυχία δημιουργίας προπόνησης. Παρακαλώ δοκιμάστε ξανά.
WorkoutListTip: Συμβουλή: Μπορείς να διαγράψεις τα περισσότερα πράγματα πατώντας παρατεταμένα. Δοκίμασέ το όταν έχεις την ευκαιρία!
deleteWorkoutMessage: Είσαι σίγουρος ότι θέλεις να διαγράψεις το "{{workoutName}}"; Αυτή η ενέργεια δεν θα επηρεάσει τις υπάρχουσες καταχωρήσεις.
deleteDayMessage: Είσαι σίγουρος ότι θέλεις να διαγράψεις αυτή την ημέρα;
deleteExerciseMessage: Είσαι σίγουρος ότι θέλεις να διαγράψεις αυτή την άσκηση;
noExercises: Δεν υπάρχουν ασκήσεις για αυτή την ημέρα
emptyWorkoutDetails: Δεν υπάρχουν διαθέσιμες ημέρες ή ασκήσεις για αυτή την προπόνηση.
deleteDayMessageDetails: Είσαι σίγουρος ότι θέλεις να διαγράψεις αυτή την ημέρα; Αυτή η ενέργεια θα διαγράψει επίσης τις ημέρες από τις επερχόμενες προγραμματισμένες προπονήσεις
deleteExerciseMessageDetails: Είσαι σίγουρος ότι θέλεις να διαγράψεις αυτή την άσκηση; Αυτή η ενέργεια θα διαγράψει επίσης την άσκηση από τις επερχόμενες προγραμματισμένες προπονήσεις
repsValidationError: Οι επαναλήψεις πρέπει να είναι αριθμός μεγαλύτερος του 0.
setsValidationError: Τα σετ πρέπει να είναι αριθμός μεγαλύτερος του 0.
exerciseNameValidationError: Το όνομα της άσκησης δεν μπορεί να είναι κενό.
dayNameValidationError: Το όνομα της ημέρας δεν μπορεί να είναι κενό.
fetchWorkoutDetailsError: Αποτυχία ενημέρωσης των λεπτομερειών της προπόνησης.
scheduleTip: Συμβουλή: Μπορείς να παρακολουθείς, να προγραμματίζεις, να καταγράφεις και να ακυρώνεις τις προπονήσεις σου στο ημερολόγιο. Όλα τακτοποιημένα, σε ένα μέρος!
noWorkoutToday: Δεν έχει προγραμματιστεί προπόνηση για σήμερα.
noWorkoutsScheduledForDate: Δεν υπάρχουν προπονήσεις προγραμματισμένες για αυτή την ημερομηνία.
duplicateLogMessage: Υπάρχει ήδη καταχώρηση για αυτή την προπόνηση στην επιλεγμένη ημερομηνία.
noDaysAvailable: Αυτή η προπόνηση δεν έχει ημέρες!
deleteLogsMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all logs associated with this workout?
notTracking: You are not tracking any workouts.
myProgressTip: Tip: You can track the exercises at the workouts you've done. Down to the every. single. detail.
noWorkoutScheduled: You need to schedule a workout to track it!
deleteWeightLog: Are you sure you want to delete all logs for this day on this date?
noLog: No logs available between the selected dates.
templateListTip: Tip: You can customize featured workouts after adding them to your workout list.
recurringWorkoutsExplanation: Set up workouts that automatically schedule themselves on your calendar at regular intervals.
deleteRecurringWorkoutMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the recurring workout for "{{workout}}" on "{{day}}"?
createRecurringWorkoutToSeeHere: Create a recurring workout to see it here.
notificationPermissionsRequired: Notification permission is required to enable notifications. Please enable in Settings.
confirmDeleteRecurringWorkout: Are you sure you want to delete this recurring workout?
pleaseEnterValidSeconds: Please enter a valid number of seconds.
enterRepsAndWeight: Please enter both reps and weight before continuing.
exitWorkoutMessage: Are you sure you want to exit? Your progress will be lost.
takeBreath: Take a breath and prepare for your next set
workoutSavedMessage: Your workout has been successfully logged!
notificationsDisableMessage: Turning off notifications will cancel all scheduled workout reminders. Are you sure?
sharingNotAvailable: Sharing is not available on this device
importConfirmMessage: Importing a database will replace your current data. This action cannot be undone. Continue?
importSuccessMessage: Database imported successfully. Please restart the app for changes to take effect.
No data available for the selected crite: No data available for the selected criteria
CESExplanation: CES (Combined Effort Score) measures your total workout volume accounting for weight, reps, and intensity.
1RMExplanation:
1RM (One Rep Max) estimates the maximum weight you could lift for a single repetition based on your performance.
(This is not the actual 1RM, developer of the app is not responsible for any injuries if you use this estimate as your 1RM)
Track a workout first to see your progre: Track a workout first to see your progress
No workout data available for graphs: No workout data available for graphs
Workout in Progress Message: Don't forget to complete your workout!
horizontalScrollHint: Scroll horizontally to see more data
timeGraphExplanation: This graph shows how long it takes you to complete your workout sessions over time.
setsGraphExplanation: This graph shows the weight progression for each set over time. Each line and color represents a different set, allowing you to track how your performance throughout your workout sessions.
graphTipText: Tip: You can press the dots on the graph to get additional information about that workout session.
repsGraphExplanation: This graph shows the reps you've done for individual sets. Each line and color represents a different set number like the Sets Graph but with the Y axis being the reps instead of weights. Perfect for tracking bodyweight exercises!
workoutDetailsTip: Tip: You can see additional information about an exercise by pressing to it's name.
invalidLinkMessage: The link must start with "http://" or "https://".
fileNotSelectedError: No file was selected or the file is invalid.
workoutAlreadyExistsError: A workout with this name already exists.
muscleDistributionExplanation: This graph shows the distribution of muscle groups in your workouts, allowing you to adjust it for your goals.
muscleGroupVolumeExplanation: This graph shows the volume done by each muscle group in your workouts within a time frame, allowing you to track your progress in each muscle group.
overallMuscleGroupsExplanation: This graph shows the set count of sets done by each muscle group in your workouts within a time frame, allowing you to see how much you're working each muscle group.
workoutVolumeExplanation: This graph shows the volume of your workouts within a time frame, allowing you to see how you performed in each workout.
recurringWorkoutExists: A recurring workout with this name already exists for this day.
startedWorkoutTip: Tip: You can switch to any exercise by pressing the three line button on the top right of the screen.
dayVolumeExplanation: This graph shows the volume of a specific workout day within a time frame, allowing you to see your progress for that day in isolation.
workoutDeleteTip: Tip: Press and hold to delete a workout
DeleteWorkoutMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this workout? If it is a logged workout, this action will also delete the logs associated with it.
logWeightsError: Please make sure all fields are filled and not zero.
logWeightsTipText: You can delete sets from exercises by long pressing on the set number.
